description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Perform sourcing activities for various type of spares & consumables, admin/stationery, equipment, major consumables etc.
              
              -	Able to handle P2P process
              
              -	Maintain good relationships with vendors and suppliers
              
              -	Make reports on purchasing and sourcing activity including procurement spend and price trend analysis
              
              -	Communicate with internal and external customers/stakeholders and cross functional team members to maintain required service level
              
              -	Negotiate with vendors for the best outcome in terms of “Total Cost Of Ownership”
              
              -	Able to carry out expediting to ensure on time delivery
              
              -	Perform purchase order management and resolve conflicts if any
              
              -	Resolve QA/QC related issues as and when occur
              
              -	Able to do vendor development and conduct vendor performance assessment
              
              -	Any other job as assigned from time to time
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Key Competencies:
              

              •	Continually develop and maintain knowledge of global and in-country supply markets and industries
              
              •	Recognize and proactively manage the risks associated with procurement from emerging markets
              
              •	Organizing/Planning Activity – problem solving and time management skills; working under deadlines; goal setting based on priorities
              
              •	Listening skills – attentive hearing; demonstrating understanding from what has been expressed
              
              •	Self-motivated
              
              •	Personal work ethics – set high standards for oneself
              
              •	Integrity – can be trusted to perform duties in a proper and honest manner
              
              •	Team skills – being able to work collaboratively with others in a participative management environment, working independently as well as working with team
              
              •	Written skills – conveying information accurately in an appropriate written format; expressing oneself effectively in writing
              
              •	Strong analytical skills
              
              •	Attention to detail there by maintaining accuracy in work; controlling/eliminating errors
              
              •	Develop and maintain collaborative relationships with teams, suppliers, peers and internal customers
              

              Qualifications & Experience:
              
              •	University degree in Engineering/ Commerce/ Business Management (Essential)
              
              •	Minimum 5 years of experience in Procurement of engineered goods and/or services  (Essential)
              
              •	Demonstrate an excellent understanding of the factors that impact the supply chain including political, economic, legal, regulatory, trade practices and cultural factors (Essential)
              
              •	Fluent in English (Essential)
              
              •	Knowledge of SAP (Essential)
              
              •	Mining experience, though not essential,  will be looked upon favorably
              


              BENEFITS FOR WORKING AT THE MINE SITE
              

              ROSTER
              

              ** 14 days on : 07 days off **
              

              Transportation:
              
              - The company provides mini-bus to transport employees to the mine site & back to Hanoi for fieldbreak as scheduled.
              

              Accommodation & meals:
              
              - The company provides freely:
              
              + Accommodation with air conditioner, tivi….
              
              + Meals: 3 meals per day / Meal allowance
              
              + Laundry service
              

              Salary / wages:
              
              - HIGH SALARY,
              

              Insurances
              
              - SHUI insurances are contributed after the period of probation as laws.
              
              - Extra insurances for employees:
              
              + Healthcare insurance
              
              + Accident insurance
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
